property.name: solr_cloud_enable
property.description: Whether Solr should be started in SolrCloud mode. This option cannot be changed.

property.name: solr_cloud_zk_directory
property.description: ZooKeeper directory (chroot) for shared Solr files. This allows Solr's files to be isolated from files for other applications sharing the same ZooKeeper instance.
property.display-name: ZooKeeper root directory for Solr files
